channel.title: House of Cards on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in House of Cards on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: House of product cards
item.description: Today in Tedium: Last weekend, you may have been like me and binged on House of Cards. Along the way, you may have spotted a few direct references to big-name brands … many of which may have paid for the chance to be on screen with Frank Underwood and SPOILER ALERT. But the nature of products on screen and elsewhere have become so prevalent that they just bleed into the action after a while—subliminally influencing us along the way.
